author: parjatak
title: Vizag-Araku-Jagdalpur- Hyderabad itinerary
text: We are planing to visit Vizag-Araku-Jagdalpur- Hyderabad in X-mas holiday. I have created a preliminary itinerary for the tour. 25/12/2015(Friday) Arrive at Vizag. Evening free for and arrangement for sightseeing etc 26/12/2015(Saturday) After breakfast, visit Yarada beach. Post lunch visit Rushikonda, Beach, Kailashgiri Hills and Submarine museum, YCMA beach etc 27/12/2015(Sunday) Visit to Kondakarla Ava lake 28/12/2015(Monday) Start for Araku Valley at 6:50am from Visakhapatnam Jn by 58501 Visakhapatnam-Kirandul Passenger and transfer to Hotel at 10:40 am. Day free for local sight seeing 29/12/2015(Tuesday) Full day return excursion to Jagdalpur 30/12/2015(Wednesday) Visit Bora cave and others, return to Visakhapatnam. Start for Hyderabad by 12739/Visakhapatnam - Secunderabad Garib Rath Express at 8:30pm 31/12/2015(Thursday) Arrive in Hyderabad at 8:10 am, transfer to hotel. Visit to Salarjung Museum, Ramoji film city, Evening free for shopping 01/01/2016(Friday) Full day Sightseeing at Hyderabad(Golconda Fort, Charminar Gate, N. T. R. Garden, Hussain Sagar Lake, Lumbiny Park). and light and sound show at Golkonda fort 02/01/2016(Saturday) Return back Please give your comment and valuable advice for the above itinerary. Specifically, Kondakarla Ava lake is interesting place to visit or I should think any other place to visit? Is it possible to plan full day return excursion to Jagdalpur from Araku and return to Araku in the same day after visiting important places there? How is condition of Jagdalpur now? Is it safe from Maoist activities? I have excluded Nagarjuna Dam from the itinerary. Is it at all worth to visit? Am I missing any important visiting place from Vizag or Hyderabad?
